original_title: 总裁别太坏 2 替嫁娇妻
overview: At his wedding, Mo Jing Qian discovers that the bride was not An Shi  Hui who he was going to marry, but An Shi Ning, her twin sister. An Shi Hui had suddenly passed away months earlier. Under pressure from his parents, Mo Jing Qian is forced to accept An Shi Ning as his bride but plots a way to divorce her. While trying to set his plan in motion, he falls in love with her.
title: Young President and His Fake Bride
